page.title: 09ORGANISATIONS IN LANGHAM
page.content: Langham is an active village with something for everyone young or old. The following list of clubs and organisations shows the variety of interests catered for: Women's Institute Langham Whist Drives Langham Seniors' Club Langham Bowls Club Langham Football Club Langham Gardeners' Association Langham Badminton Club Evening classes-Yoga,Dressmaking Public Houses-teams for pool,darts and dominoes Churches-Sunday School-Baptist Bellringing-C.of E. Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides Play Group,Mother and Toddlers
